contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} ;Dog *[[Guard dog]], a dog that barks to alert its owners of an intruder's presence ;In computing * [[Watchdog timer]], a device in computer software ;Consumer protection * An informal name given to consumer protection organizations or campaigners. See: [[List of consumer organizations]] * [[Watchdog (TV series)|''Watchdog'' (TV series)]] * [[Watchdog journalism]], any medium providing consumer watchdog activities * [[Transit watchdog]] ;Video Games * ''[[Watch Dogs]]'', an upcoming [[video game]] by [[Ubisoft Montreal]]. {{disambiguation}}
